features: ★DISTINCTIVE VINTAGE DESIGN STATIONARY SET - These stationary set is perfect for who loves to write handwritten letters. The letter writing paper with some decoration at corner and slightly color background makes calligraphy or writing clear but elegant and impressive.
★LUXURIOUS LETTER PAPER AND PRINTABLE - Both letter paper and envelopes are printed on smooth recycled paper, compatible with inkjet or laser printer, fountain pen or gel pen.
★SEALING ENVELOPES SAVE YOUR TIME - Days of envelopes without glue are gone. Our stationary includes self-sticking envelopes which ends up sending a letter easily.
★NEAT PACKAGE INDIVIDUAL PACK - Each stationery set contains 6 individual packs with 8 Japanese stationary paper & 4 envelopes of each design, totally 6 different colors assorted.
★MEASUREMENT - Stationery paper in 7.3 Inch x 10.25 Inch, Sealing envelopes in 8.5 Inch x 4.3 Inch
body.description: Stationery paper in 7.3 Inch x 10.25 Inch, 8 sheets per design, 6 designs assortment Sealing envelopes in 8.5 Inch x 4.3 Inch, 4 envelopes per design, 6 designs assortment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and Practical
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty as well as practical. Loved the large sized envelopes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchase for my daughter to pen-pal. It’s small, but very pretty. Was originally sent the wrong set, but they replaced my order very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: Cute, good quality, doesn't smear ink. Even has its own envelopes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: A beautiful floral stationary set! The paper is a good weight, not thin & flimsy. The design on both sides lets you write front & back, and the paper is thick enough that the writing doesn’t show through on the other side. Great value on a beautiful product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Good Paper
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed the paper, super gorgeous flowers and I really love that the envelopes match. One small detail is that when you write over the flowers near the top or bottom of the page, its hard to read, so you have to write around it. It's not that big of an issue, just something small I noticed. The paper is decently thick too so when you write in dark ink, it doesn't bleed through to the next page, which is nice because I try to fill up all areas of the paper. I will definitely be getting more of these when I run out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Stationary...BUT, It Is NOT 8 1/2 by 11
reviews.reviewText: What I did not like about this paper is that the description says it is 8 1/2 x 11 paper, which is what I searched for; however, it is actually about 7 x 10. So I had to make adjustments to my printer 🖨 to fit the short and narrower size. It was also a pain trying to get the printing area correct and nice.What I liked about it is all of the various stationary sets are very beautiful. It’s probably best used for hand written notes, which I seldom hand write.In short, I would recommend this stationary for hand written letters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Always a fan of stationary I’m a huge penpal lover will always purchase again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Variety of Patterns
reviews.reviewText: This is a gorgeous set of paper and envelopes that make letters look so very personal and warm. The paper is thin, but very sturdy and goes through the printer just fine. I hand write the envelopes, but they would go through well too especially because they close on the side, which also makes the paper pretty unique. It's a very classy way to send a friendly letter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a present for my 89 year old mum who doesn't do emails. She is absolutely delighted. Paper is patterned on both sides with lovely designs the matching envelopes are cute too. (I completed the present with address labels which can also be bought on Amazon and a book of stamps. But don't buy the stamps on Amazon its way more expensive than your local post office)

I was very pleased when I received this stationery. The paper and matching envelopes are in plastic bags by individual print/colour. The envelopes are a big strange since you put the paper in them from the side instead of the top but this does not detract from their beauty at all. You can write a letter on both printed sides of each sheet without worrying about your writing bleeding through. I wrote two letters already with a gel pen and was able to write on both sides. I don't think I've ever seen stationery that was printed on both sides! I will most definitely order more when I run low. I love letter writing. It seems to be a lost art today but I will do my part to keep it alive and I will use this stationery set to help me do it!
Very beautiful paper. Looks just like they show. Very nice to be able to send such beautiful letters to friends. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lovely patterns, the paper is of reasonable quality.
